channel.title: Flying barrels [Fixed]

item.title: Flying barrels [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
After the water level was lowered where you activate generator in Power Up, some barrels were still in the same position, as if the water didn’t lower. Touching them caused them to update and fall.
